metadata.dc:title: Glucometers for hospital use: creation of a multi-disciplinary team for the selection and monitoring process
metadata.dc:description: This work highlights what the authors consider to be critical aspects for setting up POCT (point-of-care testing) measurements, whether simple ones such as glucometers or critical ones such as those made with blood gas analyser (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Mas, E
Castilla, T
Marín, J. L
Beldini, J. L
Robles, D
Ballesta, A. M
metadata.dc:title: Glucómetros de uso hospitalario: creación de un equipo pluridisciplinar para el proceso de selección y seguimiento Seis años de experiencia
